title: Chemistry, applications, and future prospects of structured liquids
content:
Chem. Soc. Rev., 2024, 53,9652-9717
DOI: 10.1039/D4CS00549J, Review Article
Ahmadreza Ghaffarkhah, Seyyed Alireza Hashemi, Ali Akbar Isari, Mahyar Panahi-Sarmad, Feng Jiang, Thomas P. Russell, Orlando J. Rojas, Mohammad Arjmand
This review article centers around structured liquids and their underlying mechanisms. The focus is on the chemistry, applications, characterization, reconfigurability, and future prospects of this class of soft materials.
